mapper.select: SELECT M.MENU_ID, M.MENU_NAME, PM.CUP, M.IMAGE, PM.ACCOUNT_ID, PM.SHOT, PM.SYRUP, PM.WHIPPED_CREAM, PM.DRIZZLE, PM.SIZE, PM.OPTION_SUM, PM.PRICE FROM SGT_PRIVATE_MENU AS PM JOIN SGT_MENU M ON PM.MENU_ID=M.MENU_ID WHERE ACCOUNT_ID=#{ accountId }

INSERT INTO SGT_PRIVATE_MENU (PRIVATE_MENU_ID, MENU_ID, ACCOUNT_ID, SHOT, SYRUP, WHIPPED_CREAM, DRIZZLE, SIZE, OPTION_SUM, PRICE, CUP) VALUES (NEXTVAL('SGT_PRIVATE_MENU_SEQ'), #{ menu_id }, #{ account_id }, #{ shot }, #{ syrup }, #{ whipped_cream }, #{ drizzle }, #{ size }, #{ option_sum }, #{ price }, #{ cup })
